passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.line2: Passkeys can be used as passwordless credentials for signing in to Jian Unified System.

account_security.title: Account Security
account_security.line2: These trusted tokens can be used as credentials to access the Jian Unified System.

third_party_accounts.title: Third-Party Accounts
third_party_accounts.line1: These third-party accounts can be used to log in, and also serve as your contact information for Hermes notifications.
